data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I went to Spain when I was a teenager. We ____ the ____ all ____ the ____, ____ the ____ to ____ south. We ____ historic ____ and ____ amazing ____. I hope to go back one day, but I need to practice my Spanish first!
data.partBlankContent: I went to Spain when I was a teenager. We to__ the b__ all aro___ the cou____, fr__ the no___ to t__ south. We s__ historic buil_____ and a__ amazing fo__. I hope to go back one day, but I need to practice my Spanish first!
data.fullContent: I went to Spain when I was a teenager. We took the bus all around the country, from the north to the south. We saw historic buildings and ate amazing food. I hope to go back one day, but I need to practice my Spanish first!
data.answer: 我十几岁的时候去了西班牙。我们乘公共汽车周游了全国，从北向南。我们参观了历史建筑，吃了美味的食物。我希望有一天能回去，但是我需要先练习我的西班牙语!
